name: Bitwatch
short_description: Monitor Bitcoin addresses in mempool and on-chain with notifications.
description: Monitor Bitcoin addresses in mempool and on-chain with notifications. Bitwatch is a self-hosted application focused on tools, blockchain, monitoring, dashboard. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Bitwatch on your home server to monitor bitcoin addresses in mempool and on-chain with notifications without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Bitwatch to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
